actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an additional itemized deduction for individuals who perform voluntary public service by working for certain organizations.

summary.text: Allows, under the Internal Revenue Code, an income tax deduction for any volunteer public service work contribution made by such individual for the taxable year. Limits such deduction to a maximum of $2,000. Requires that a minimum of 50 hours of service be performed for a qualified recipient organization in order to qualify for the deduction.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an additional itemized deduction for individuals who perform voluntary public service by working for certain organizations.
